title: Paranormal Activity
creator_credit: Blumhouse Productions, Solana Films, Jason Blum, Oren Peli and Amir Zbeda
brief_description: After a young, middle-class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be demonic but is certainly the most active in the middle of the night. Followed by five terrifying installments in the franchise, this is the original found-footage shocker that started it all.

constellations_other.name: Found footage and the first camcorder
constellations_other.description: Amateur filmmakers turned the camera on their own lives when camcorders like the Sony Betamovie BMC-100P came on the market. The style of footage filmed on camcorders has inspired many fictional films, particularly in the horror genre.
